html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12632024-11-29DFO
ActFisheries Act
SubjectPossession and Export of Elvers Regulations
PrecisPOSSESSION AND EXPORT OF ELVERS REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit the possession of elvers without a licence, subject to certain exceptions; (2) prohibit the export of elvers without a licence; (3) allow the Minister to issue licences for possession and export of elvers, as well as conditions on those licences; (4) impose requirements related to the keeping of records to enable the traceability of elvers in Canada, as well as the sealing and labelling of containers of elver for export; and (5) make consequential amendments to related regulations.
AttachmentsAttachment
